amendment.description: Amendment allows multiple peril and flood insurance coverage of apartment buildings up to the total of the number of dwelling units times the maximum coverage limit per residential unit.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part B of House Report 110-351 to allow multiple peril and flood insurance coverage of apartment buildings up to the total of the number of dwelling units times the maximum coverage limit per residential unit.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Taylor amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 268 - 143 (Roll no. 919).
